title: Lighting Points
fullText:
A protective earthing conductor shall be provided at each lighting point.

Exception: A protective earthing conductor need not be provided at a lighting point if—
• (a) the lighting point is supplied at extra-low voltage; or
• (b) the lighting point is supplied by a separated extra-low voltage system; or
• (c) the lighting point is intended only for the connection of electrical equipment having double insulation; or
• (d) the lighting point is located in a position that is not an earthed situation.
